libmk documentation
===================
|Travis| |LicenseGPL| |PyPI|

``libmk`` and the Python wrapper ``masterkeys`` provide a low-level
interface to the LEDs on the MasterKeys keyboard series.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   source/devices

   Documentation: libmkc <source/libmkc/index>
